name: ~Demon Sword~
description:
Instructions:

  • WASD to move
  • LeftShift to run
  • Space to Jump
  • Space in Air to Double Jump
  • Left Click to Swing your Sword
  • [When Fighting the Sword's Bloodlust] Button mash Space to Escape
  • [When Fighting Sword] Press F to commit seppuku and end your run.

Demon Sword: -Gyaku Karuma no Maken-
Jam Build - Made in 72 Hours for ScoreSpace #6

This was my Third gamejam, and the theme was 'karma' -- so in this game you control a samurai who happens to aquire this Demon Sword that binds to him. Killing enemies makes the blade more powerful, however, the blade aquires a bloodlust, drawing you to kill the villagers you are supposed to protect. Honestly, Not the best I could've done, but school started and fucked with my schedule, with sleep and with work.  8/17/19 - 8/19/19
